netflix_titles.description: Listings of movies and tv shows on Netflix

show_id.description: Unique ID for every Movie / Tv Show

type.description: Identifier - A Movie or TV Show

title.description: Title of the Movie / Tv Show

cast.description: Actors involved in the movie / show
example_data: Rachel Crow, Ashleigh Murray, Sasheer Zamata, Danielle Nicolet, David Sullivan, Tim Blake Nelson, Missi Pyle, Arturo Castro, Sharon Lawrence, Brooke Markham, Kinna McInroe, Myko Olivier, Lance Gray
Garrett Ryan, Adam Hochstetter, Haley Tju, Brianne Tju, Jenna Ortega, Aaron Eisenberg, Celestial, Richard Balin
Huma Qureshi, Siddharth, Rahul Khanna, Arif Zakaria, Seema Biswas, Sanjay Suri, Akash Khurana, Ashwath Bhatt, Anupam Bhattacharya, Adarsh Gourav

country.description: Country where the movie / show was produced
example_data: United States, India, South Korea, China

date_added.description: Date it was added on Netflix

release_year.description: Actual Release year of the move / show

rating.description: TV Rating of the movie / show

duration.description: Total Duration - in minutes or number of seasons

example_data: With different personalities, life goals and taste in men, five female college students become housemates in a shared residence called Belle Epoque.
Desperate to meet his daughter, a convict cuts a deal by ratting out his old boss. Free and searching for his family, he must dodge a hit on his life.
